title: Sergey Vekhtev
text:
Sergey Vekhtev (; ; born 8 May 1971) is a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and former player. He is the manager of Russian club <a href="FC%20Peresvet%20Podolsk">FC Peresvet Podolsk</a>.
Honours.
Lokomotiv-96 Vitebsk
Belshina Bobruisk
